versions.summary: Update script overhaul: self-copy guard prevents mid-execution file corruption, PowerShell-based JSON version parsing, git reset --hard for clean updates, added frontend rebuild step (npm install + vite build) to ensure dist is up to date.

Cortex trigger fix: Resolved settings desync between frontend and backend, removed rebuild_cycle_base (was preventing first trigger), redesigned CortexUpdateIndicator (glass-morphism, no emoji), extended ContextBar with cortex progress display (C/X dual-bar), added progress API endpoint.
Complete frontend redesign with React SPA, Cortex memory system, and new onboarding flow.
Initial release of PersonaUI with basic chat, persona system, and prompt engine.
